33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Muhammad bin Yusuf narrated that As-Sa'ib bin Yazid said:"Yazid performed Hajj in the Farewell Pilgrimage with the Prophet (s.a.w) when I was seven years old." So 'Ali bin Al-Madini narrated from Yahya bin Sa'eed Al-Qattan: "Muhammad bin Yusuf was a very reliable narrator of Hadith, and As-Sa'ib bin Yazid was his grandfather, and Muhammad bin Yusuf would say: 'As-Sa'ib bin Yazid narrated to me- and he is my grandfather from my mother's side

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ لاَ يَحِلُّ لِمُسْلِمٍ أَنْ يُرَوِّعَ مُسْلِمًا
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About It is Not Lawful To Intimidate A Muslim
